price: 42. Kaadu Nabii Nuuc doynikih innah yan dawaanikiy edde feeraana keenih ginne.
arabic: وَخَلَقۡنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثۡلِهِۦ مَا يَرۡكَبُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wakhalaqnā lahum min mith'lihi mā yarkabūna
